title: #104: Analysis of the Netflix Series Mindhunter
description:
The RCP team of Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti analyze more episodes of the Netflix original series, Mindhunter. Plus Jim tells a story of when he was asked to profile someone at a party.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
